description: Promotion hopefuls Stockport and Charlton share the spoils in a goalless League One draw at Edgeley Park.
title: Stockport County 0-0 Charlton Athletic
title_page: Stockport County 0-0 Charlton Athletic - BBC Sport
maintext:
After winning their first two Football League games against Charlton Athletic in 1997 and 1998, Stockport County are since winless against the Addicks (D1 L4).
Charlton Athletic are unbeaten across their last seven league games against sides from Greater Manchester (W4 D3), this coming after a run of seven consecutive losses against teams from the county between August 2021 and October 2023.
Since the start of March last year, Stockport have won 16 of their 22 home league games, scoring 1.9 goals-per-game on average during that time.
